text: Gayathri Films was an Indian film production and distribution company headed by Chithra Ramu and Chithra Lakshmanan. == History == Gayathri Films was one of the several production companies used by brothers Chithra Lakshmanan and Chithra Ramu as a part of their involvement in Tamil cinema. Notable films made as a part of the studio included Mann Vasanai (1983) and Soora Samhaaram (1988). Chithra Ramu died in 2017. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders sortable" style="width: 90%; text-align: center;" |- ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Language ! scope="col" | Director ! scope="col" | Cast ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Synopsis ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | |- ! scope="row" |Mann Vasanai | 1983 | Tamil | Bharathiraja | Pandiyan, Revathi, Vijayan | | |- ! scope="row" |Vaazhkai | 1984 | Tamil | | Sivaji Ganesan, Ambika, Pandiyan | | |- ! scope="row" |Soora Samhaaram | 1988 | Tamil | | Kamal Haasan, Nirosha, Nizhalgal Ravi | | |- ! scope="row" |Periya Thambi | 1997 | Tamil | | Prabhu, Nagma, Goundamani | | |- ! scope="row" |Chinna Raja | 1999 | Tamil | | Karthik, Roja, Priya Raman | | |} == References == Category:Film distributors of India Category:Film production companies based in Chennai Category:Film production companies of Tamil Nadu Category:Indian film studios
title: Gayathri Films
